item.title: Common Voice Armenia: Frequently Asked Questions
item.description: Common Voice Armenia was launched in May 2021. This post contains some context on what it is and how you can help. What is Common Voice Armenia? ðŸ”—Common Voice Armenia is a subcommunity of Common Voice , an initiative by Mozilla Firefox to help teach machines how people speak. Common Voice invites all languages to join the community provided that contributors follow Mozilla’s playbook. The wheel that keeps Common Voice spinning is getting people to donate their time and voices to accumulate large public datasets - in their case, a collection of multi-lingual voice corpora that is already being used in academia and industry.
